mapper.select: SELECT id, skuId, image, tb_category_id, title, price FROM (SELECT IF(@tem_id = id, @tmp_num:=@tmp_num+1, @tmp_num:=0) 'tmp_num',@tem_id:=id 'id',skuId,image,tb_category_id,title,price FROM (select a.id, b.id skuId, a.image, a.tb_category_id, b.title, b.price from tb_store a join tb_sku b on a.id = b.tb_store_id order by b.id asc) c) a where a.tmp_num < 1
